user_query: I'm planning a cross-country trip with my friends in the United States. Can you fetch the gas prices in different states? We would like to know the gas prices in Washington (WA). Additionally, provide us with the list of cities in the USA along with their corresponding gas prices.

TaskList.description: Fetch gas prices in Washington state (WA).
Fetch gas prices for various cities across the USA.
Compile a comprehensive list of cities along with their gas prices in the USA.
